dict.string: Today is 26 days, which are three weeks and five days, of the Omer
Hoy es veintiséis días, que son tres semanas y cinco días del Omer.
Aujourd'hui est vingt-six jours, qui sont trois semaines et cinq jours du Omer
СЕГОДНЯ ДВАДЦАТЬ ШЕСТЬ ДНЕЙ - ЧТО СОСТАВЛЯЕТ ТРИ НЕДЕЛИ И ПЯТЬ ДНЕЙ - ОМЕРА.
הַיּוֹם שִׁשָּׁה וְעֶשְׂרִים יוֹם שֶׁהֵם שְׁלֹשָׁה שָׁבוּעוֹת וַחֲמִשָּׁה יָמִים לָעֽוֹמֶר
Hod ShebeNetzach
Hod ShebeNetzaj
Hod chebeNetsa'h
ОЙД ШЕБЕ-НЕЦАХ
הוֹד שֶׁבְּנֶֽצַח
Hod of Netzach
Humility in Endurance

Yielding - which is a result of humility - is an essential element of enduring. Standing fast can sometimes be a formula for destruction. The oak, lacking the ability to bend in a hurricane, is uprooted. The reed, which yields to the wind, survives without problem.
Endurance ,is fueled by inner strength. Hod of netzach is the humble recognition and acknowledgment that the capacity to endure and prevail comes from the soul that G-d gave each person. This humility does not compromise the drive of endurance; on the contrary, it intensifies it, because human endurance can go only so far and endure only so much, whereas endurance that comes from the Divine soul is limitless.
A Lesson from Trees: Determination
Roots always find their ways to water. Challenge brings out the deepest strength inside a person.
https://youtu.be/IWt4wUMFBkA

When you awake, acknowledge G-d for giving you a soul with the extraordinary power and versatility to endure despite trying challenges. This will allow you to draw energy and strength for the entire day.
Do I know when to yield, out of strength not fear?
Why am I often afraid to yield?
Do I attribute my success solely to my own strength and determination?
Am I convinced that I am all powerful due to my level of endurance?
Where do I get the strength at times when everything seems so bleak?
